p: Total polyphenol (TP) and tannin (T) analysis was based on a reaction with FCR and spectrophotometric determination of TP and T at 720 nm-indirect analysis after precipitation T with casein [ 46, 47]. The plant material (0.250 g; above ground parts) was previously extracted with methanol (30%, v/v), using water bath (70 °C) for 15 min [ 49, 50]. The contents of TP and T in V. saturejoides extracts were evaluated in three independent analyses and were expressed as mg/g of dry weight of herbal material [ 48, 49] according to equation: A = 1.069cexp. − 0.0029 (1) where A is absorbance and cexp. is measured concentration (µg/mL).
